{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Synology |model=MR2200ac |series=AC2200 |asin=B07HPSQZKN |newegg=N82E16833593005 |price=140 |est_release_date=10/11/2018 |fcc_date=08/15/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Edimax |manuf_model=RE-7674 |manuf_rev=STR V1.0A |availability=now |type=wireless router, mesh node |fcc_id=YOR-MR2200AC |pcb_id=1244-01001110-50Z |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NE7176WF, E071700; |cpu1_cspeed=716 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6433FM2I-08G |fla2=4 GiB |fla2_brand=Kingston |fla2_model=EMMC04G-M627 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NE7176WF, E071700; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9886 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8072 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2623L;SKY, 2623L, 6028Y;2; ,,, 2.4GHz SPDT Switch with Low-Noise Amplifier;Skyworks;SKY85201-11;SKY1, 5201, 703V;2; ,,, 5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85728-11;SKY85728-11, 721JY, 1721 MY;4; |flags=WPA3, Wave2, MU-MIMO, OWE, 802.11k/v/r, SRM 1.2, DFS (master), |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Synology MR2200ac Mesh WiFi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.synology.com/en-global/products/MR2200ac}}
"1244-01001110-50Z ES" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
*{{WiFiCert|WFA77433|05/10/2018}} *{{WiFiCert|WFA77433|10/24/2018}} (WPA3 Support)
*[https://www.synology.com/ru-ru/releaseNote/RT2600ac ''Synology RT2600ac'' Release Notes - v1.2-7742] (2018-10-16) :Added support for WPA3 Personal/Enterprise :security encryption on RT2600ac and MR2200ac. :Added support for Wi-Fi Enhanced Open (OWE) :security encryption on RT2600ac and MR2200ac.
{{See also|Synology RT2600ac|Synology RT1900ac}}
===Specifications=== *[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 @716MHz Quad-Core ARM CPU *Tri-band Wi-Fi: single SSID with 802.11k/v/r *Ports: 1x WAN GbE, 1x LAN GbE, 1x USB 3.0 *Arrives with Synology Router Manager 1.2 *Dedicated Mobile App
